heroes.name: Batman
heroes.catchphrase: It’s not who I am underneath, but what I do that defines me.

heroes.name: Green Lantern
heroes.catchphrase: In brightest day, in blackest night, no evil shall escape my sight. Let those who worship evil’s might, beware my power – Green Lantern’s light

heroes.name: Spiderman
heroes.catchphrase: With great power comes great responsibility
